actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Sight
special_abilities.desc: The eagle's Perception is 19 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Seabird
special_abilities.desc: The eagle can swim up to 30 feet on its turn, but it must start and end its movement either flying or on a solid surface, such as a ship or beach. If it is swimming at the end of its turn, it must succeed on a DC 10 CON save or it immediately begins to sink and suffocate. A suffocating eagle must succeed on a DC 8 STR check to fly out of the substance where it is sinking.
